original: @ga_@#/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod du gsungs pa'i
analyzed: @ga_@#/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod du gsungs pa'i

original: mdor bsdus pa'i 'jam dpal🔽gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/
translated: Spoken in the Piṭaka of the Vidyādharas

original: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bid+ya d+ha ra pi ta ka sam k+ship+ta mdzi shri sa d+ha nam/
analyzed: @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bid+ya d+ha ra pi ta ka sam k+ship+ta mdzi shri sa d+ha nam/
translated: In the language of India: Vidyādharapiṭakasamkṣipta-mañjuśrīsādhana

original: bod skad du/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod du gsungs pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i
analyzed: bod skad du/_rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod du gsungs pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i
translated: In the Tibetan language: The Concise Sādhana of Mañjuśrī Spoken in the Piṭaka of the Vidyādharas

original: 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/_'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshhal lo//🔽sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes su pad+ma dang zla ba'i🔽dkyil 'khor gyi steng du thig le dkar po rnam par bsgoms nas spro ba la sogs
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs/_'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshhal lo// sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes su pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du thig le dkar po rnam par bsgoms nas spro ba la sogs
translated: Homage to the noble Mañjuśrī.🔽After meditating on emptiness with the previously taught ritual, on top of a lotus and moon maṇḍala, one should meditate on a white drop.

original: pa sngon du 'gro bas de yongs su gyur pa las yi ge dkar po de yongs su
analyzed: pa sngon du 'gro bas de yongs su gyur pa las yi ge dkar po de yongs su
translated: After the preliminaries of emanating and so on, that completely transforms into a white syllable.

original: gyur pa las 'jam dpal a ra pa tsha na gcig pu 'ba' zhig nyid do/_/snying
analyzed: gyur pa las 'jam dpal a ra pa tsha na gcig pu 'ba' zhig nyid do/_/snying
translated: That completely transforms into Mañjuśrī, alone and solitary.

original: gar sa bon rnam par bsams nas yang dang yang du spro ba la sogs pa'i rnam
analyzed: gar sa bon rnam par bsams nas yang dang yang du spro ba la sogs pa'i rnam
translated: In the heart, one should visualize the seed syllable, and again and again emanate and so on.

original: par bya'o/_/om d+hih_swa ha zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bzlas pa bya'o/_/rig
analyzed: par bya'o/_/om d+hih_swa ha zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bzlas pa bya'o/_/rig
translated: One should recite the mantra Om dhih svaha.🔽This is the concise Mañjuśrī sādhana taught in the Basket of the

original: pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod du gsungs pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgrub
analyzed: pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod du gsungs pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgrub

original: sa pa lo tsha ba ba ri dge slong d+harma kirtis bsgyur ba'o//_//
analyzed: sa pa lo tsha ba ba ri dge slong d+harma kirtis bsgyur ba'o//_//
translated: Translated by the Indian abbot Vairocanarakṣita and the🔽great reviser and translator Venerable Kawa Peltsek.
